contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 15, 2003 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-1st-section
Tournament for Brass
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalis - euphonium - Markham. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
Welsh League Champions—Ammanford/Rogerstone Runners Up—Abergavenny/Markham
Aug. 12, 2015, 2:10 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:01 p.m.
1 Markham and District Band Andrew Jones
2 Ammanford Silver Band Colin Hogg
3 Rogerstone Band Ceri Thomas
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Lyndon Price
5 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
Withdrawn Ynyshir Band Alan Gibbs
